        public void insertIntoGalamseyDB​(java.lang.String vegColour,
                                 int colourValue,
                                 double latitude,
                                 double longitude,
                                 int year,
                                 int obID)
        Method for inserting entry into galamsey databse
        Parameters:
        vegColour - vegetation colour
        colourValue - the colour value
        latitude - the latitude of the position
        longitude - the longitude of the positon
        year - the year of the galamsey
        obID - the observatory ID the galamsey belongs to.
